creditline: The Fred R. Salisbury II Fund
description: case opens to a slanted, felt-covered writing surface with a pencil tray, covered compartment and inkwell included
markings: handwritten letter and receipt, pasted to underside of bottom portion of writing surface; \'N. STARKEY,/Manufacturer of Portable Desks,/Dressing Cases, Medicine Chests,/and/Ladies Work Boxes/117 South 2nd Street,/[illegible]/PH [label torn]/A.\', on label, pasted to underside of top portion of writing surface
title: Lap desk
